message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $15,000 represents the true value of the product, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is my final offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
